name: Leergut-Simulator
description: Trashy browser-based video game playing in Germany, where you are a peasant living off of "Leergut" you find on the streets.

name: DevBot.NET
description: A bot that communicates via text. You can tell the bot requirements. The bot will help refine these requirements. The bot then generates source that satisfies all requirements. The process is then highly iterative.

name: cli-lighthouse-viewer
description: A node.js cli tool capable of rendering a lighthouse audit report inside the terminal.

name: EduPlex
description: A terminal multiplexer for educational purposes of how terminal multiplexing works.

name: Cqrs.NET
description: A command query responsibility segregation framework for .NET. Allows pipeline processing of commands and queries.

name: StaticSite.NET
description: A static site generator written in .NET. Supports some form of templating.

name: ConsoleCasino.NET
description: A cli game collection of classic casino games
